# AVPlayerAudiovisualBackgroundPlaybackPolicy.continuesIfPossible

**Case**

The app continues playback, if possible.

## Declaration

```swift
case continuesIfPossible
```

## Policies

- **AVPlayerAudiovisualBackgroundPlaybackPolicy.automatic**: The system decides whether playback continues.
- **AVPlayerAudiovisualBackgroundPlaybackPolicy.pauses**: The app pauses playback.
